contest-event.event-date: May 4, 1968 D Midlands Area (Fourth Section) Midlands Area (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas.
